dmca.title: eBay's Tough Talk
dmca.body:
[Private],
 
As we discussed today, eBay cannot allow you to continue to operate your website (or offer email or other services) at www.ebaytradingassistant.com due to the potential for confusion and given eBay's need to enforce its trademark rights.  We must ask that you completely deactivate your site.
 
We regret any inconvenience this may cause you but we appreciate your prompt cooperation.
 
Please reply to this email and confirm that you will comply as requested.
 
Sincerely,
[Private] 
Intellectual Property Counsel 
eBay Inc. 
[Private]
San Jose, California 95125 
Tel:  [Private]
Fax:  [Private]
